subject: FYEO
body:
Can't satisfy your girlfriend? Do you want to?
Our shop
We know the solution you are looking for! Viagra, Cialis, Viagra Pro, Cialis Soft - the right choice you can make!
Buy medications at RX online drug store!
Everything you need to cure yourself.
With best regards,
Donald Dale
 
 
V nashem polozhenii ne prihoditsia vybirat. Etim zhe vecherom my dvinemsia otsiuda. Okazyvaetsia, eto zver. Krepostnuiu strazhu i Stalnuiu druzhinu pridetsia privesti v polnuiu boevuiu Gotovnost, no sdelat eto nado po vozmozhnosti tiho, nezachem ranshe vremeni Trevozhit narod. 
No poka my doplyvem do Neureji, ty smozhesh vosstanovit svoi sily. My mozhem Obmeniatsia. Vnezapno v lico vmeste s iarkim svetom udaril uragannyj veter, edva ne Sbivaia s nog, i ia obnaruzhil, chto obrel telo. No ty ubesh sebia sam! On soglasilsia. Ia v svoiu ochered staralsia ulybatsia V otvet. Mne nechego teriat, a mestsladkaia shtuka, i ia hochu dostavit sebe Podobnoe udovolstvie, raz ono budet poslednim v moej zhizni. Etot malenkij trans, kak obozval ego Nkot, v samom dele Okazalsia neuiazvim. Obratnuiu zhe storonu many, s simvolom solnca, mozhno uzret tolko odnim sposobom uderzhivaia ee gorizontalno, zaglianut snizu. 
Kliuch prishel sam soboj i strukturiruiushchej ziabiu proshelsia po nervam. Vot eto da. Togda skazhi vot O chem. Dva shaga, slovno dva pryzhka cherez bezdonnuiu propast, slovno dve Beskonechnye mili. ejisuminyon WkBKUVBxRVtRVEUcRkNURVdBWFpeHFBV
